long_description: Built for freestyle performance, the Salomon Hologram snowboard bindings feature amazing cushioning to soften your landings and reduce vibrations when you're ripping up the slopes. ShadowFit baseplates have an anatomic fit and flexible heel loop to provide mobility, performance and comfort; Kevlar(R) Quickwire supports around heels provide strength. Adjustable toe ramps offer you the best possible control and power on your toe edge; integrated mounting system keeps all your hardware in place when adjusting bindings. Air bags in the heels and dual-density EVA baseplate padding damp vibrations and cushion landings. Hologram highbacks feature an ergonomic design for all-day comfort; highbacks feature integrated foward lean, and can be rotated to match your riding angles. 3D, asymmetric ankle straps prevent pressure points while offering a secure fit; toe straps grip boots to lock your feet in. Micro adjustments on straps let you lengthen or shorten straps for an optimal fit. Powerglide aluminum buckles are lightweight and easy to operate. Universal discs are compatible with all existing mounting systems including the Burton Channel system.
